_Herogiri_ (qv) is a remake of the Telugu hit, Balupu. The story is about the heroine and her uncle, who specialize in taking unsuspecting guys for a ride in the name of love. The hero (Dev) decides to give them a taste of their own medicine for duping his friend. But Dev himself is trying to run away from his notorious past, which catches up eventually.::Ujjal Dass
